name: Bali Cultural Immersion Group Tour
description: Join fellow travelers on this comprehensive cultural journey through Bali. Experience authentic traditions, visit ancient temples, and connect with local communities in this carefully crafted group tour.
shortDescription: Comprehensive cultural group tour with authentic traditions and temple visits
highlights: Visit 5 ancient temples with guided explanations
Traditional cooking class with local family

itinerary.title: Arrival and Group Introduction
itinerary.description: Meet your fellow travelers and guide. Introduction to Balinese culture and traditions.

itinerary.title: Temple Trail and Art Villages
itinerary.description: Explore ancient temples and visit traditional art villages with the group.
activities: Visit Tirta Empul holy water temple

itinerary.title: Mount Batur Sunrise Trek
itinerary.description: Early morning group trek to witness the spectacular sunrise from Mount Batur.
